name: polygamist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who is married to more than one person at the same time: The high-profile polygamist took a third wife last year. There are cases where a polygamist takes a younger woman as his current wives get older, which may create emotional stress for the women. See
polygamy
More examplesFewer examplesThey disagree about whether polygamists should be sent to jail for practicing a religious belief.For people who aren't polygamists, relationships between multiple wives sharing one husband are difficult to understand.Charging a polygamist with bigamy puts all polygamists at risk.
